name: Project Management by Xmind
tagline: Turn mind maps into lightweight project plans
description: Plan in maps, break down with AI, track in Gantt. No complex setup, no switching tools. Everything you need to turn ideas into impact—nothing you don't.

name: ChatGPT Atlas
tagline: The browser with ChatGPT built in
description: With Atlas, ChatGPT can come with you anywhere across the web—helping you in the window right where you are, understanding what you’re trying to do, and completing tasks for you, all without copying and pasting or leaving the page.

name: ProblemHunt
tagline: Startup ideas that people actually need
description: Problem: the main reason startups fail is a lack of market need. 42% of startups built solutions that didn't solve real problems. Solution: we manually find people with unresolved problems they are willing to pay to solve.

name: Manus 1.5
tagline: Faster, higher quality, unlimited context & upgraded builder
description: Manus 1.5 is a faster, smarter AI agent system for research, analysis, and full-stack web app creation. It delivers 4× speed, higher reliability, deeper reasoning, collaboration, and a new Library—plus seamless, production-ready app building through chat.

name: Ito
tagline: VibeType anywhere with your voice (Open Source)
description: Ito is an open source voice assistant for Mac and Windows that transforms your intent into smart text in any app. Speak naturally to write emails, messages, or code without typing. Say intent, not just words.

name: DevReadyKit
tagline: UI Framework tailored for SaaS & Devtools MVP’s
description: DevReady Kit gives you production-ready UI components for modern SaaS apps - free for commercial use. Built with React, Tailwind, and TS for devs and founders building SaaS or Devtools. Copy, customise, and ship polished products fast without a frontend team!.

name: Fumadocs 16
tagline: Beautiful docs. Optimized for React and Next.js.
description: Fumadocs is a beautiful documentation framework for developers, flexible, performant, running on your React framework.

name: To-Do List Hell
tagline: Where tasks go to die
description: Welcome to the digital afterlife for all those tasks haunting your conscience. To-Do List Hell adds some much needed fun to task management. With vim-inspired key bindings, you can fly around your keyboard and put your task nightmares out of their misery.

name: Deta Surf (Beta)
tagline: AI Notebooks for the internet (Open Source)
description: Surf is an AI notebook that brings your files and the web directly into your stream of thought.

name: Claio.ai
tagline: The AI Scribe for clinical ops
description: AI Scribe for healthcare professionals.

name: Attrove AI
tagline: Stay on top of everything across Slack, email & meetings
description: Drowning in Slack, email, and meetings? Attrove monitors your workspace and surfaces what actually needs your attention—before it becomes urgent. Get daily briefs, track rising topics, and never drop the ball. Your workspace, on autopilot.

name: Claude Skills Hub
tagline: Discover and download Claude skills
description: A curated directory of Claude Code skills for everyone. Browse, discover, and download skills to enhance your Claude experience.

name: Metorial
tagline: Connect your AI products to 600+ integrations in minutes
description: Build AI agents with 600+ integrations in hours, not months. Metorial's MCP-powered platform handles OAuth, monitoring, and deployment automatically. Open-source with Python & TypeScript SDKs. Easily self-hostable.

name: Serpex.dev
tagline: Enrich your AI & Apps with structured, real-time search data
description: Serpex.dev offers a REST API/SDKs for real-time, structured Search data, giving LLMs and SaaS apps live search insights without scraping complexities. Great for AI applications seeking current search intelligence and data projects.

name: Cheers GEO
tagline: Dominate AI recommendations for local services
description: When someone asks ChatGPT for a local service, AI recommends based on reputation, not ads. Cheers optimizes your online presence and turns your employees into a review engine so that AI recommends your business first.

name: MonsterWriter
tagline: Like Overleaf and Notion had a baby
description: MonsterWriter - Don't be bothered by formatting content, moving headings from one page to another, manual creation of bibliographies,.. MonsterWriter provides a distraction free writing environments optimized for scholar writings

name: Elemind
tagline: Sleep - On Demand
description: Wearable neurotech, for faster sleep, on-demand

name: Shuttle
tagline: Where ambitious professionals invest alongside top VC funds
description: Shuttle unlocks access to co-investments alongside top VC funds, regardless of your knowledge, network, or net worth - a world previously reserved for institutional investors and the ultra-wealthy. Invest from as little as €250 per quarter.

name: Slate
tagline: minimalist to-do with timer
description: Introducing Slate: focus timer built for ADHD. Monochrome design eliminates visual noise. Tasks expire after 7 days. Customizable Pomodoro sessions with auto dark mode. Track with heatmaps. Privacy-first: offline-only, no accounts, no cloud sync.

name: LiftmyCV 2.0
tagline: AI job search agent & auto-apply toolkit
description: LiftmyCV 2.0 finds relevant openings, creates custom resumes and cover letters per job, and auto-applies on your behalf using AI. Prefer more control? Use First Apply and Copilot Mode to review and improve key applications manually.
